title: Tohir Malodustov
text:
Tohir Malodustov (born 12 September 2000) is a <a href="Tajikistan">Tajikistan</a>i professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="FK%20Khujand">Khujand</a>.
Career.
International.
Malodustov made his senior team debut on 10 July 2019 against <a href="North%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">North Korea</a>.
Career statistics.
International.
"Statistics accurate as of match played 1 February 2021"
